columns.name: Name
columns.label: Table Name
columns.help: Enter the name of the table

columns.name: AllowInsert
columns.label: Allow Insert
columns.help: If true, models based on this table will allow inserts. Can be overridden at the model level. Defaults to true if not set.

columns.name: AllowUpdate
columns.label: Allow Update
columns.help: If true, models based on this table will allow changes. Can be overridden at the model level. Defaults to true if not set.

columns.name: AllowDelete
columns.label: Allow Delete
columns.help: If true, models based on this table will allow inserts. Can be overridden at the model level. Defaults to true if not set.
